title: Dream Walker
description: A serial killer the media has dubbed, The East Coast Lover is killing rich widows in their fifties. The case heats up landing Gary in Daytona, Florida. While checking out the only new lead in two years, fate blind sides him with the Phantom he has dreamed of since he was a child. Gary is determined to catch the killer and the woman of his dreams.Lena had learned at a young age to keep life simple and ignore the strange. Four months after her twenty fifth birthday the her simple life turns into chaos. The Dreams more vivid. The Voice more demanding. Her life and heart are on the line. The need to protect all she loves drives the secret her mother has kept for twenty-five years closer to the surface. In the middle of chaos can she trust what she feels for the man that makes her pulse race and long for a life of love.
author: Denise Harvey
